title.subheader: Digital identification and personal digital wallet

notifications.logOut: Your session has been successfully ended
notifications.unknownState: An error occurred while processing the user status
notifications.sessionContinued: The session has been successfully extended

shell.descriptionMinutes: {'Remaining time till session ends is {count} minutes'}

logOut.title: Log out
logOut.description: Are you sure you want to log out?

sessionEnded.title: Your session has ended
sessionEnded.description: The allocated session time has ended. To continue, please log in again.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.activateDescription: Activate the wallet using the QR code in the NOBID EUDIW app.
dashboard.documentDescription: A list of available documents that can be added to your wallet.

active.title: Wallet is Active
active.description: Your digital wallet has been activated! Feel free to use it for online services and storing digital documents!
active.label: Activated

activate.title: Wallet activation
activate.firstText: A digital identity wallet will simplify your life and ensure that your data stays safe and private.
activate.stepTwo: 2. go to the "Scan QR code" section,
activate.stepFour: 4. after you scan it, we will send a confirmation code to your email ({email}). Enter this code when asked by the app.
activate.errorNoDocument: This document is not available to you.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Check if the page address is correct and try again, or return to the homepage

errors.invalidRightsTitle: You do not have permission to use this system

phone.title: Phone number registration
phone.firstText: We need your phone number to send you security notifications and assist in emergencies (e.g., if you lose access to your wallet).
phone.secondText: A one-time verification code will be sent to this phone number.
phone.agreementLabel: I agree to use my phone number in accordance with the

phoneVerification.title: Phone number verification
phoneVerification.firstText: Enter the verification code that was sent to your number
phoneVerification.secondText: You should receive a message with the verification code within 3 minutes.
phoneVerification.wrongCode: Incorrect code. Enter the code again

email.title: Email address registration
email.firstText: We need your email address to send you security notifications and assist in emergencies (e.g., if you lose access to your wallet).
email.secondText: A one-time verification code will be sent to this email address.
email.agreementLabel: I agree to use my email address in accordance with the

emailVerification.title: Email address verification
emailVerification.firstText: Enter the verification code that was sent to your email address
emailVerification.secondText: You should receive an email with the verification code within 3 minutes.
emailVerification.wrongCode: Incorrect code. Enter the code again

document.title: Driver's license
document.description: To add the document to your wallet, open the 'NOBID EUDIW' app, go to the 'Scan QR Code' section, and scan the QR code below.
document.secondText: To add this document your wallet:
document.stepTwo: 2. go to the "Scan QR code" section,
document.stepFour: 4. after you scan it, we will send a confirmation code to your email ({email}). Enter this code when asked by the app.

errors.forbidden: You do not have permission to perform this action!

403.title: Insufficient permissions to access this page
403.description: Access denied! Additional permissions are required to access this page.
